description: This file contains SQL statements to set up database schema, including extension creation, enum types, tables for users, accounts, categories, transactions, budgets, goals, alerts, and a materialized view, mostly related to a financial expense tracking application.
external_files: No external SQL files are referenced; only extensions and built-in features are used
external_methods: SQL functions for UUID generation, current timestamp, and date truncation used within schema definitions
calls: CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS pgcrypto
